description:
"Akihiro is a fashion school student. Believing he is talented, he lives his life looking down on others, but he shrinks at the slightest of confrontations, and he`s unable to speak his mind with his classmates as well.
One day, he is talking to himself as he thinks about his own brand design when a young man misunderstands the situation and approaches Akihiro.
Akihiro frantically runs into an alley when he sees a strange door in front of him, the door leading to Nina`s shop."

titles.title: アキヒロ "わたしをみて"
